fko.chessly.player.computer.PulseEngine

Class PulseEngine_v2

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fko.chessly.mvc.ModelObservable
        • fko.chessly.player.computer.PulseEngine.PulseEngine_v2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Engine, ObservableEngine

    public class PulseEngine_v2
extends ModelObservable
implements ObservableEngine
    Implementation of a chess engine originally written by Phokham Nonava.
    It uses pseudo classes and int values to represent types instead of proper Java classes - this approach is much faster than Java classes!

    Features:
    • time control
    • nega max
    • AlphaBeta Pruni
    • Principal Variation
    • Mate Distance Pruning
    • Quiescence
    • Transposition tables
    • Evaluation tables ( only good idea if eval is expensive)
    • Opening book
    • Pondering
    • FIXME: TestFix - Board cannot see move repetition if the move has been received by Game
    • FIXME: Improve Quiescence (Stalemate a.o.)
    • TODO: End Game
    • TODO: Better position evaluatoin
    • TODO: Idea: Delay Move Generation http://www.madchess.net/post/madchess-2-0-beta-build-23
    • TODO: End Game Solver

    Author:
    Frank Kopp, Phokham Nonava

      • PulseEngine_v2

        public PulseEngine_v2()
        Generates an instance of this Engine implementation. It initializes caches, move generators and the opening book if these features are enabled by properties, options or code.
